summary: Django's father is framed by his business partner Clusker and shot by a bounty Killer. Django inherits his fathers part of the business and a score to settle with Clusker.
cast: Glenn Saxson|Evelyn Stewart|Fernando Sancho|Nando Gazzolo|Guido Lollobrigida|Erika Blanc|Marcello Tusco|Valentino Macchi|Antonio Piretti|Alberto Lupo|Lewis E. Ciannelli|John Hart|Ettore Arena|Fortunato Arena|Bruno Ariè|John Bartha|Alberigo Donadeo|George Eastman|José Manuel Martín|Osiride Pevarello|Riccardo Pizzuti|Attilio Severini|Clemente Ukmar
title: Yo soy Trinidad
